name: Private Jake Erwin

topics.topic_text: Want to play a hand of Caravan?

topics.response_text: {Laughs}Nice try. Care to try your luck again?
Not too bad. How about we play again?

topics.topic_text: I'm all done playing for now.
topics.response_text: Okay. If you want to play again sometime, let me know.
Didn't you save President Kimball? You're my new hero!
Us troopers mostly come to the Strip for our R&R. We blow off some steam by gambling, drinking, partying, or fighting.
What have you heard? I know people think I'm a little on the wild side, but I'm just trying to have fun, you know?

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the Ambassador?
topics.response_text: He's a little stiff and stuffy. Doesn't leave the office that much, always surrounds himself with papers and reports.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Captain Pappas?
topics.response_text: She may be a bit of a hardass, but she's the best damn Captain we've had here. I'd be careful around her. You don't want to get on her bad side.
Yeah, I've got a few ideas that I'm working on. Maybe I'll let you in on it once I have something.

topics.topic_text: That doesn't sound like a good idea.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I know. That's why I'm not really going to do it.

description:
Private Jake Erwin is a 24 year-old Caucasian Male.

Private Jake Erwin is a young NCR soldier serving as a guard at the NCR Embassy in New Vegas. Standing at about 5'10" with short-cropped brown hair and a lean build, he has a mischievous glint in his eyes that hints at his prankster nature. Despite his uniform and position, he rarely stands at attention for long, often finding ways to slack off or engage in small mischief when no one is looking. He's currently walking on thin ice with his superiors due to his recent string of pranks, with rumors of a reprimand circulating among the embassy staff.

Private Jake Erwin's Personality: Jake is a classic prankster with a rebellious streak. He's witty, quick on his feet, and always looking for an opportunity to pull a harmless prank. Beneath his mischievous exterior, he's actually quite loyal to the NCR but expresses his loyalty through unconventional means. He's charismatic and can be charming when he wants to be, but his impulsiveness often gets him into trouble. He's not malicious in his pranks; he simply enjoys the thrill and the reactions of others.

Private Jake Erwin's Backstory: Jake Erwin grew up in one of the NCR's agricultural settlements in California. At 18, he enlisted in the NCR Army, seeking adventure and a way to escape the monotony of farm life. He showed promise during basic training but quickly developed a reputation for his prankster behavior. After a series of minor infractions and one major prank that embarrassed a superior officer, he was transferred to the NCR Embassy in New Vegas as a disciplinary measure. The embassy was supposed to be a "quieter" posting, but Jake has found new opportunities for mischief in the diplomatic environment, particularly targeting the stuffy Ambassador Crocker.
